body.text:
{% if colgate_ng_language_options == 'Others' and colgate_ng_other_language == '1' %}_[Q No. 2/2 ]_
Batutuwan da aka zaba: Iyaye da Yara 
Zaɓi tambayoyin cikin jerin da ke ƙasa, don samun shawarwarin kula da baki

 1. Hakoran yara
 2. Goge hakoran yara
 3. Goge hakoran Jarirai 
 4. Hakori sako-sako {%else%}_[Q No. 2/2 ]_
Selected Topic: Mothers and children

 Choose the queries listed below ⬇️, to get the oral tips.

 1. Baby teething
 2. Brushing kid's teeth
 3. Brushing baby's teeth
 4. Loose tooth{%endif%}
